mapper.insert: insert into user (openid, name, phone, sex, id_number, avatar, create_time) values (#{openid}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{idNumber}, #{avatar}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT DATE(create_time) AS date, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN create_time >= #{begin} AND create_time <= #{end} THEN id END), 0)AS newUserCount, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT id), 0) AS totalUserCount FROM user WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end} GROUP BY DATE(create_time);
